item.title: Building a Custom Vulnerability Scanner with Python: Automating Security Checks for Web Applications
item.description: Introduction linkWhile automated vulnerability scanners offer a broad range of tests, they often fall short when it comes to identifying application-specific vulnerabilities. Building a custom vulnerability scanner with Python empowers you to create targeted checks tailored to your unique needs. This tutorial will guide you through the process of developing a basic scanner leveraging Python’s flexibility and powerful libraries. item.title: Mastering Burp Suite Intruder: Advanced Fuzzing and Payload Customization for Vulnerability Discovery
item.description: Introduction linkBurp Suite Intruder is a powerful tool for automating customized attacks against web applications. While it’s often used for simple brute-forcing attacks, its true potential lies in its ability to perform sophisticated fuzzing with precise payload manipulation. This tutorial will guide you through advanced Intruder techniques to uncover hidden vulnerabilities.
